newsitem.title: INDIA: India TELCO unit to partner SAP.
newsitem.headline: India TELCO unit to partner SAP.

text.p: India's Tata Engineering and Locomotive Company Ltd (TELCO) said on Thursday it was launching a wholly-owned subsidiary to market engineering software in association with major global companies.
Tata Technologies, the new firm, would collaborate with SAP Asia Pacific, part of SAP AG of Germany, Concentra Corporation of the U.S., Tata Information Systems Ltd and Tata Elxsi.
The alliance would offer solutions as a strategic tool to ehnace competitiveness in all areas of business operations from design to distribution, Tata Group chairman Ratan Tata said.
Asked how it would help TELCO, one of the new firm's clients, Tata said it "would make TELCO more competitive, cutting the design, process and manucaturing cycles."
